code: import React from'react';import{MDBContainer,MDBRow,MDBCol,MDBCard,MDBCardBody,MDBTable,MDBTableBody,MDBTableHead}from'mdbreact';import DocsLink from'../components/docsLink';import SectionContainer from'../components/sectionContainer';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var TableScrollPage=function TableScrollPage(props){var data={columns:[{label:'#',field:'id',sort:'asc'},{label:'First',field:'first',sort:'asc'},{label:'Last',field:'last',sort:'asc'},{label:'Handle',field:'handle',sort:'asc'}],rows:[{id:1,first:'Mark',last:'Otto',handle:'@mdo'},{id:2,first:'Jacob',last:'Thornton',handle:'@fat'},{id:3,first:'Larry',last:'the Bird',handle:'@twitter'},{id:4,first:'Mark',last:'Otto',handle:'@mdo'},{id:5,first:'Jacob',last:'Thornton',handle:'@fat'},{id:6,first:'Larry',last:'the Bird',handle:'@twitter'}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MDBContainer,{className:"mt-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DocsLink,{title:"MDBTable Scroll",href:"https://mdbootstrap.com/docs/react/tables/scroll/"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBRow,{className:"py-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBCol,{md:"12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SectionContainer,{noBorder:true,header:"Static table vertical scroll",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBCard,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBCardBody,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MDBTable,{scrollY:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBTableHead,{columns:data.columns}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBTableBody,{rows:data.rows})]})})})})})})]});};export default TableScrollPage;
